metaData.label: WH
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Obstetrics Gynaecology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecology Child

metaData.label: ONCO
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Chemotherapy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urology/Urology Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology Radiotherapy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Haematology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatric Oncologist OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urology

metaData.label: KIDS
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatrics OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Neurology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child Dental Therapists OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Otolaryngology (ENT) Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Allergy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Endocrinology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child/Adolescent Psychiatrist OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dermatology Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Rheumatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Perinatology

metaData.label: SURG
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal General Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Colorectal Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urological Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecological Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Rheumatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Traumatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Orthopaedic Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Neurology
